TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FormViewDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner

Docs.summary: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 在可视化设计器中，当从源视图切换到设计视图中，标记源代码，介绍了<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控件进行分析，并在设计图面上创建控件的设计时版本。 在切换到源视图时，设计时控件的标记源代码持久保存，并编辑到 Web 页的标记。
属性<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner>类提供了以下功能：
- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.ActionLists%2A>属性返回<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>对象，它通常包含一个对象，派生自<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>继承树中每个级别的设计器的类。
- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>属性返回的格式设置中显示的方案集合**自动套用格式**对话框。
- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>属性返回的模板的关联的模板组集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>。
- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>属性始终返回`true`，，该值指示设计器创建关联的临时副本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>来生成设计时标记。
<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner>类方法提供了以下功能：
- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法返回用于呈现关联的标记<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>在设计时。
- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.Initialize%2A>方法准备设计器，以查看、 编辑和设计关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>。
- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A>时调用方法关联的数据源的架构<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>更改。
## Examples 以下代码示例演示如何扩展<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner>类，以更改由派生的控件的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控件在设计时。
该示例从`MyFormView`控件从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控件。 `MyFormView`只是一个副本的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>。 该示例还从`MyFormViewDesigner`类派生<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner>，并将<xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute>对象`MyFormViewDesigner`上`MyFormView`控件。
`MyFormViewDesigner`会重写以下项：
- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.SampleRowCount%2A>属性指定的页导航行的设计时视图的`MyFormView`包含四个页面链接。
- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法以包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.Caption%2A>属性，如果它指定的为新的第一行`MyFormView`网格在设计时。 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A>的属性`MyFormView`是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.NotSet>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.None>值，<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>绘制控件以使其更容易看到周围的蓝色虚线的边框。
[!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner/CS/formviewdesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner/VB/formviewdesigner.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 在内部构建的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner>类在创建关联后<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控件或一份<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>设计图面上的控件。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property ActionLists As DesignerActionListCollection

Docs.summary: Gets the designer action list collection for this designer.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property AutoFormats As DesignerAutoFormatCollection

Docs.summary: Gets the collection of automatic formatting schemes for display in the **Auto Format** dialog box.
Docs.value: 一个 ，它包含 的预定义方案。

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection>对象填充从 XML 编码的内部类的成员。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml () As String

Docs.summary: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.
Docs.returns: A containing the markup used to render the at design time.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 如果尚未为定义项模板<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames%2A>为空控件的集合<xref:System.String>数组无法获取数据源的架构。 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>刷新<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>对象以强制调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>方法。 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>然后调用基方法，以生成标记。
如果尚未为定义没有任何项模板<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法来生成呈现到占位符的标记。
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法的类中继承自<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner>类，以更改的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控件在设计时。 该示例向要包含的网格中添加新的第一行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.Caption%2A>属性，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.Caption%2A>定义。 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A>属性的控件的派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.NotSet>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.None>值，<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>绘制控件以使其更容易看到周围的蓝色虚线的边框。 该示例不会更改控件的运行时外观。
[!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner/CS/formviewdesigner.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner/VB/formviewdesigner.vb#4)]

block.para: 如果重写方法，请务必调用基方法，因为它最终，经过多级重写时，调用上控件或一份控件来生成标记。

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance string GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml () As String

Docs.summary: Gets the markup text that is used to render a placeholder for the associated control at design time.
Docs.returns: A containing markup text that renders to a placeholder on the design surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果为标记<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控件不包括的项模板之一<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法，它包含有关如何编辑模板内容和一条消息说明的占位符为生成标记项模板进行审批。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Initialize(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent component) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Initialize (component As IComponent)

Docs.summary: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 设计器宿主调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.Initialize%2A>方法时它已准备好使用设计器来呈现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控件。 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.Initialize%2A>和其基方法配置属性，并连接到所需的设计器的操作的事件。
`component`参数是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>与此设计器或一份相关联的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控件。

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnSchemaRefreshed() cil managed

Docs.summary: Called when the schema of the data source for the associated control changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除非在设计器中的模板编辑模式或字段是正在添加或编辑，<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A>方法调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A>方法，后者又调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A>方法来更新<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控件以反映数据源更改。

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PreFilterProperties(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PreFilterProperties (properties As IDictionary)

Docs.param: The properties for the class of the component.
Docs.summary: Adds or removes properties in the properties grid in a design host at design time, or provides new design-time properties that might correspond to properties on the associated control.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool RenderOuterTable { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.RenderOuterTable : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Specifies whether the control uses an outer table container to apply inline CSS style rules.
Docs.value: 如果该控件使用外部表容器来应用内联 CSS 样式规则;否则为。 默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner>控件使用外部表容器来应用内联样式规则在标记中的。 可以通过将此属性设置为删除外部表容器`true`。 这提供了在应用中的控件标记的 CSS 样式规则的灵活性。

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property SampleRowCount As Integer
protected: virtual property int SampleRowCount { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the number of sample rows for the associated control to display.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.SampleRowCount%2A>始终返回`2`。 这将导致两个页面链接中的页导航行显示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制在设计时，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PagerSettings%2A>模式是数值。
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.SampleRowCount%2A>继承自的类中的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner>类更改的页链接的页导航行中显示的号码<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控件在设计时。 此示例将导致显示四个页面链接。
[!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner/CS/formviewdesigner.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner/VB/formviewdesigner.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property TemplateGroups As TemplateGroupCollection

Docs.summary: Gets a collection of template groups for the fields of the associated control.
Docs.value: 一个 ，其中为 中的每个模板化字段包含一个元素。

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>属性构造一系列<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup>对象，一个关联的每个控件模板<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控件。 控件模板是标头、 页脚、 寻呼程序、 项、 编辑项、 插入项和空数据。 控件模板<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup>元素包含一个<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition>对象。

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property UsePreviewControl As Boolean
protected: virtual property bool UsePreviewControl { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a temporary copy rather than the actual control that is associated with the designer to generate the design-time markup.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>属性始终为 true 时，该设计器使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控件，其中包含一份关联的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控件来生成设计时标记。 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控件不会影响任何持久性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>。 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>属性已被重写以返回`false`，在设计器将使用关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>本身来生成设计时标记。

block.para: 您可以重写属性返回或以确定其值，该值基于该控件会使用类级别的标记是否对象。如果未重写控件将忽略。
